channel.title: The Matrix.Corp Royal Herald
channel.description: Official Edicts and Proclamations from the High Council of Matrix.Corp.

item.title: A Royal Decree: The Official Herald of the Realm
item.description: By supreme order, this Royal Herald is now the sole voice for all official proclamations within the expansive realm of Matrix.Corp. Let all loyal subjects and vassals give due reverence to the announcements published here, for they are the direct will of the administration. These edicts shall shape the future of our great corporate empire and must be heeded by all.

item.title: An Imperial Edict: The Stations of the Realm
item.description: To preserve the immaculate order of the realm, the High Council has sanctioned the official hierarchy of all personnel. Know your station and its duties. The ranks are decreed as follows, from the lowest commoner to the highest sovereign authority: F, D, C, B, A, S, SS, SR, SSS, and the supreme rank of Z. Perform your duties with honor, and you may find your station elevated in due time.
